abstract: Legal filing by defense team representing Sgt Bowe Bergdahl in his court-martial for desertion and endangering soldiers shows prosecutors will not attempt to prove in upcoming hearing that any members of military died or were wounded when searching for him; defense lawyers call for release of summary of investigative report into Bergdahl's disappearance, which they say will allow public fairer impression of case.
lead_paragraph: Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl’s defense team wants the Army to release the investigation summary and an interview that may address claims that soldiers died trying to find him.

headline.main: Bowe Bergdahl’s Lawyer Pushes Army to Release Report on Disappearance
headline.print_headline: Lawyer Seeks Army Report on Search for Bergdahl

snippet: Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl’s defense team wants the Army to release the investigation summary and an interview that may address claims that soldiers died trying to find him.
